name: Watercress and Endive Salad
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: appetizer, side dish, belgian endive, watercress, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cut off the tough stems of the watercress and discard.
Cut off the end of the endive and cut the head into bite-size pieces.
Rinse watercress and endive and drain or spin dry. Put in a salad bowl.
Put the lemon juice, vinegar, mustard, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Using a wire whisk, beat in the oil. Pour the dressing over the salad greens and toss.
